title: Haters be quiet - Beats Studio Buds Plus
description: Check out the Vessi StormBurst and their other styles at  . Use code SHORTCIRCUIT for 15% off your entire order and free shipping.  Adam has been a long-time defender of Beats' headphones, and with the new Beats Studio Buds Plus, he might finally convince people that Apple's influence has been good for their products. Does the sound quality match the flashy transparent design or are these wireless earbuds just a good-looking dud?  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Give Beats a chance 0:45 Taking a look at the box 1:46 Unboxing 2:29 Design impressions 4:14 Sponsor - Vessi 4:42 Adam makes a mess 4:50 Quick pairing and misc. features 7:50 Listening, Transparency mode, and Spatial Audio impressions 10:43 Labs' testing results 12:11 Microphone test and misc. specs 12:52 Pricing and overall thoughts 13:42 Outro
